name: New Aeon Magic Apps
description:
An all-in-one AI creative suite for social media content.

SYSTEM FEATURES:

1. AI IMAGE STUDIO
- Magic Prompt Editing (Gemini 2.5)
- Smart Text Extraction & Background Cleaning
- URL Import & History Management

2. OFFER CREATOR
- Professional Retail Templates (Square, Story, Reel)
- AI Copywriter (Headlines, CTAs)
- High-Res PNG Export

3. STORY ANIMATOR
- Cinematic Camera Moves (Pan, Zoom, Tilt, Parallax)
- Rich Text Overlays with Typewriter Effects
- 4K-Ready MP4 Video Rendering

4. AUDIO ENGINE
- Curated Royalty-Free Library
- Custom MP3 Uploads & Mixing
